sense.def:
Kdor je
kindly
, je ljubezniv, ljubeč in sočuten.

seg.quote: Being a kindly and reasonable man, he at once apologized.
...the great virtues of humility and kindliness.

sense.def:
Kadar nekoga prosimo
to kindly do something
, s tem pokažemo svojo nejevoljo.

cit.quote: ali bi bili lahko prosim tako prijazni

seg.quote: Kindly take your hand off my knee.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
looks kindly on something
, tisto odobrava.

seg.quote: The White House will look more kindly on a robust economy.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
does not take kindly to something
, tistega ne odobrava.

seg.quote: They are unlikely to take kindly to this suggestion.
